word_mean: 〔复irides)〔NA〕虹膜：角膜后的环形色素膜，中为瞳孔
是眼血管膜最前部，由瞳孔周围环形肌纤维及可使瞳孔开大的一薄层平滑肌纤维构成，以此控制进光量。虹膜的后面由二层色素上皮细胞组成
鸢尾根：蓝旗鸢尾(Iris versicolor)的根，过去用作泻剂、催吐剂及利尿剂
图示晶状体与瞳孔的关系
位于黑睛之后，晶珠之前的环形隔膜样组织，中间的圆孔为瞳神，虹彩具有调节瞳神开缩的作用。

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, via Latin from Greek iris 'rainbow, iris'

entry.def: The iris is the round coloured part of a person's eye.
An iris is a tall plant with long leaves and large purple, yellow, or white flowers.

means.word_mean: 1. plants with sword-shaped leaves and erect stalks bearing bright-colored flowers composed of three petals and three drooping sepals
2. muscular diaphragm that controls the size of the pupil; it forms the colored portion of the eye
3. diaphragm consisting of thin overlapping plates that can be adjusted to change the diameter of a central opening
